results.name: Triangular array read by rows: T(n,k) is the number of n-permutations that have exactly k distinct cycle lengths.
comment: T(A000217(n),n) gives A246292. - _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 21 2014
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..170, flattened
P. Flajolet and R. Sedgewick, Analytic Combinatorics, Cambridge University Press, 2009
maple: b:= proc(n, i) option remember; expand(`if`(n=0, 1,
T:= n-> (p-> seq(coeff(p, x, i), i=1..degree(p)))(b(n$2)):
xref: Cf. A208437, A242027 (the same for endofunctions), A246292, A317327.
results.author: _Geoffrey Critzer_, Nov 07 2012
